answers.answer: WHEN did you test?   Random testing times gives random results.Fasting    first thing in the morning.before you eat will give you a staring point1 hour after eating will tell you how carbohydrates effect your BG and your phase 1 insulin response.2 hours after tells you how well your phase 2 insulin response is.a BG of 63 is lowa BG of 32 is very low and is dangerous! your very close to passing out and or dying with BG that low
